column1: SPATIAL CONFLICT RISK REGISTER — SpatialFlow Output
Identifies weeks/zones where multiple trades or deliveries compete for the same site space

column7: Full site lockdown on pour day. No other deliveries Wk 5
Demob excavator before block delivery. Sequence: Mon demob → Wed blocks
Schedule on different days. Vigas Mon, Lumber Wed. Clear West 30ft
Stage lumber East of crane centerline. Mark no-go arc with cones
Plumber: ground floor first. HVAC: attic first. Daily coordination mtg
Assign zones by room. Electrician: East half. Plumber: West half Wk 9
Designate scaffold bay gaps at South for material pass-through
Lift roof tiles before East scaffold bay erected. Sequence critical
Pour portals first. Interior trades enter after 24hr cure
Plaster fully dry (7 days min) before hardwood. Plaster Wk 14, floor Wk 15+
Cabs first → tile up to cab bases → plumbing trim. Strict sequence
Protect hardwood with ram board during stone work. Inspect daily
Paint AFTER all rough trim complete. No wet paint with live trades
Paint stored in ventilated room. No energising in paint storage room
